segment.source: This section describes how to configure a MED-V image on a computer on which the MED-V client and MED-V management application are installed, and explains the following:
segment.target: This section describes how to configure a MED-V image on a computer on which the MED-V client and MED-V management application are installed, and explains the following:

segment.source: How to Create and Test a MED-V Image
segment.target: How to Create and Test a MED-V Image

segment.source: Describes how to create a MED-V image, and then test the image locally.
segment.target: Describes how to create a MED-V image, and then test the image locally.

segment.source: How to Pack a MED-V Image
segment.target: How to Pack a MED-V Image

segment.source: Describes how to pack a MED-V image so that it can be added to a deployment package or uploaded to the server.
segment.target: Describes how to pack a MED-V image so that it can be added to a deployment package or uploaded to the server.

segment.source: How to Upload a MED-V Image to the Server
segment.target: How to Upload a MED-V Image to the Server

segment.source: Describes how to upload a MED-V image to the server.
segment.target: Describes how to upload a MED-V image to the server.

segment.source: How to Localize a MED-V Image
segment.target: How to Localize a MED-V Image

segment.source: Describes how to localize a MED-V image either through extracting or downloading the image.
segment.target: Describes how to localize a MED-V image either through extracting or downloading the image.

segment.source: How to Update a MED-V Image
segment.target: How to Update a MED-V Image

segment.source: Describes how to update a MED-V image to create a new version of the image.
segment.target: Describes how to update a MED-V image to create a new version of the image.

segment.source: How to Delete a MED-V Image
segment.target: How to Delete a MED-V Image

segment.source: Describes how to delete a MED-V image.
segment.target: Describes how to delete a MED-V image.

segment.source: After the MED-V image is configured, the computer should not be part of a domain because the join domain procedure should be performed on the client after the deployment, as part of the MED-V workspace setup.
segment.target: After the MED-V image is configured, the computer should not be part of a domain because the join domain procedure should be performed on the client after the deployment, as part of the MED-V workspace setup.
